relationships.description: Email correspondence regarding a media article

analysis.purpose: To inform Jeffrey Epstein that they cannot print an article because they don't have a subscription to the publication
analysis.significance: Shows communication between Epstein and someone at Apollo Global Management regarding media content

notable_quotes: We cannot print it since we don't subscribe

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present

illegal_activity.description: The email contains a link to a news article about Michael Wolff's book 'Fire and Fury' regarding Donald Trump - this is shared media content, not first-hand illegal activity

details: Reference to nymag.com/Daily Intelligencer article about Michael Wolff's book 'Fire and Fury' regarding Donald Trump

public_knowledge.context: Michael Wolff's book 'Fire and Fury' about the Trump administration was widely covered in media in early 2018 and became a bestseller

analysis.summary: Melanie Spinella responds to Jeffrey Epstein's email containing a link to a New York Magazine article about Michael Wolff's book on Donald Trump, informing him they cannot print the article due to not having a subscription to the publication.
